full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 467 Filed 11/15/21 Page 146 of 158 146 LBAAMAX5ps Rocchio - Cross
1 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, I believe there's a binder for Dr. Rocchio.
2 THE COURT: OK. Is it in there?
3 MS. POMERANTZ: It should be under tab 6, your Honor.
4 THE COURT: Tab 6.
5 MR. ROHRBACH: And would your Honor like a copy of it?
6 THE COURT: I can't hear if you're not using the mike.
7 MS. POMERANTZ: Would your Honor like a binder as well?
8 THE COURT: Sure.
9 All right. So we're looking at Government 6.
10 MR. PAGLIUCA: Correct, your Honor, page 3 of 24.
11 Q. I'm going to skip the next one, Dr. Rocchio, which deals with a discrete set of individuals. If we go to the third one down, if you go to the right-hand column, which is the summary.
12 A. Yes.
13 Q. This includes -- this is a 50 percent disclosure rate, as identified in this summary. Correct?
14 A. 50 percent did not disclose until after the age of 19, I believe.
15 Q. "Half of the participants had not disclosed their CSA experiences before the age of 19." Right?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. That means half did.
18 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
19 DOJ-OGR-00007325
